title: The Story of paper making
creator_credit: Films of Fact and Central Office of Information
brief_description: The story of paper making from the papyrus of the Egyptians to the machine made product of today. Film closes with scenes of craftsmen making hand-made paper required for artists, draughtsmen, etc.
